effect.sword_shield: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power. Changes nature power to moonblast.

short_effect.sword_shield: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.
